resp:

2. This number of episodes (9) is indeed the fewest among all the entries in the table.

     | タイヨウのうた                   | taiyou no uta               | tbs          |         10 |
     | レガッタ～君といた永遠～         | regatta~kimi to ita eien~   | tv - asahi   |          9 |
     | 下北サンデーズ                   | shimokita sundays           | tv - asahi   |          9 |

     | マイ☆ボス マイ☆ヒーロー          | my☆boss my☆hero             | ntv          |         10 |

   - The entries with the fewest episodes (9) are "レガッタ～君といた永遠～" and "下北サンデーズ". No entry has fewer than 9 episodes.

3. **Conclusion:**
